channel.title: Default settings
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Default settings" - Uziki - double check these!

item.title: Re: Default settings
item.content:encoded: McMasters can catch and ban storehouse robbers now, so hopefully behavior like that should die off as soon as people realize they won't get away with it anymore.

item.title: Re: Default settings
item.content:encoded: Our Village is too large to get random Genin. It's not a problem we have to worry about.

item.title: Default settings
item.content:encoded: Since random Genin got turned on, you should keep a tight lid on the store house for default membersâ€¦ it seems some have been going around lifting items and then leaving the village!
